original_text: But Jonathan had not heard his father charge the people with the oath, so he put out the tip of the staff that was in his hand and dipped it in the honeycomb and put his hand to his mouth, and his eyes became bright.
korean_text: 요나단은 그의 아버지가 백성에게 맹세하여 명령할 때에 듣지 못하였으므로 손에 가진 지팡이 끝을 내밀어 벌집의 꿀을 찍고 그의 손을 돌려 입에 대매 눈이 밝아졌더라

sentences.original_text: But Jonathan had not heard his father charge the people with the oath
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 요나단은 아버지가 백성들에게 맹세하게 한 것을 듣지 못했습니다.

sentences.original_text: so he put out the tip of the staff that was in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 손에 든 지팡이 끝을 내밀었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and dipped it in the honeycomb
and put his hand to his mouth
